graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	iamGetTenants (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	iamFindTenant (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	iamFindTenantById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:IamUpdateTenantInput!)
{
	iamUpdateTenant (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	iamDeleteTenantById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	iamDeleteTenants (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		code
		logo
		isActive
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
